lead_paragraph: A fire gutted a rubber slipper factory in a Manila suburb on Wednesday, possibly killing dozens of workers, officials said.

headline.print_headline: Asia; The Philippines: Deadly Fire at Factory
headline.main: The Philippines: Deadly Fire at Factory

snippet: A fire gutted a rubber slipper factory in a Manila suburb on Wednesday, possibly killing dozens of workers, officials said.
abstract: Fire in Philippines guts factory near Manila, and authorities report that dozens of workers may have been killed; 65 people are missing.
